irb_consent.title: Research Study Information
text: You are invited to participate in a research study about wildfire evacuation decision-making.
Your participation is voluntary. You may stop at any time without penalty.
Your responses will be kept confidential and used for research purposes only.
This study involves reviewing information and making decisions in a simulated wildfire scenario.

contact_screen.title: Contact Information (Optional)
text: If you are willing, you may provide contact information so we can follow up with you about this study.
Providing contact information is optional and not required to participate.

scenario_description.title: Wildfire Evacuation Scenario
text: You are at home during a wildfire event in your area.
Over the next several hours, conditions may worsen.
You will receive information from different sources.
At each stage, review the available information and decide what you would do.

-5.text: Faint smoke visible on the horizon.

-4.text: Smoke clearly visible in the area.

-6.text: Red Flag Warning issued for the area.

-5.text: Fire Weather Watch remains in effect.

-4.text: Evacuation Warning issued for nearby zones.

-2.text: Mandatory Evacuation Order issued for adjacent areas.

-1.text: Mandatory Evacuation Order expanded. Leave immediately.

-3.text: Family: Are you thinking of leaving?

-6.text: Breaking news: Wildfire reported in nearby foothills.

-4.text: Update: Fire growing rapidly with strong winds.

-3.text: Live coverage: Evacuations underway in nearby communities.

-2.text: Officials urge residents to follow evacuation orders.

-1.text: Breaking: Major roads closing due to fire activity.

-6.text: Roads are clear and traffic is normal.

-4.text: Light congestion reported on main routes.

-3.text: Stop and go traffic on evacuation routes.

-2.text: Heavy congestion and multiple road closures.

-1.text: Gridlock on major exits from the area.

-3.text: Cell service intermittent in some areas.

-2.text: Water pressure reduced in parts of the community.
Waiting for someone to return home.
